actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1547.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-477, authorizing at Government expense the transportation of house trailers or mobile dwellings, in place of household and personal effects, of members in a missing status, and the additional movements of dependents and effects, or trailers, of those members in such a status for more than 1 year, to make it retroactive to February 28, 1961.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Makes retroactive to February 28, 1961, the Federal law authorizing, at Government expense, the transportation of housetrailers or mobile dwellings, in place of household and personal effects, of members of the armed forces in a missing status, and the additional movements of dependents and effects, or trailers, of those members in such a status for more than one year. Requires the presentation of claims by January 1, 1977, or 10 years from the date the claim accrued, whichever is later.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 92-477, authorizing at Government expense the transportation of house trailers or mobile dwellings, in place of household and personal effects, of members in a missing status, and the additional movements of dependents and effects, or trailers, of those members in such a status for more than 1 year, to make it retroactive to February 28, 1961.
